name: SSJ-Thin Ice
description:
Keep your kingdom together! Show solidarity by alerting your loyal subjects of danger and keeping them safe for as long as possible.  Losing penguins will cost morale and slow everyone down.

Controls 

Movement - WASD

Call - Left Click + Hold

Credits
